title: Robinson Crusoe
description:
4 x 60 mins

The Story of Robinson Crusoe has been told many times on films and TV, but this dramatisation goes back to the originals books - yes, Defoe wrote a sequel.

The first two episodes comprise the original novel and the second two the sequel, "Robinson Crusoe and His Further Adventures " in which he returns to find the island in chaos and later travels to the Arctic. A different slant on a "familiar" story.
